summary:
> LINK · 'Next Day Shipping' by Adult DVD on Bandcamp
Just a really fun band writing music with a pacey beat, distorted but legible vocals, staccato synth lines, and lyrics about prepping for doomsday.  Makes me wish I was 19 and in a grimy nightclub in Glasgow at 1am
title: > Bringing the fun songs of Adult DVD to your attention

summary: The recent Second Circuit decision in Hachette v.  Internet Archive is only the latest battle in the war on libraries and the freedom to read
title: Big publishers think libraries are the enemy
